bibl.title: Antiphon the Sophist. The Fragments.
bibl.seg: PENDRICK Gerard J. (Edited with Introduction, Translation, and Commentary by), Antiphon the Sophist. The Fragments. (Cambridge Classical Texts and Commentaries. 39.)
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2002, 8°, xii-472 pp. ISBN 0-521-65161-1. £55.

C.R. par B. Clarot, EtCl 72 (2004) pp. 142-143. - Odile De Bruyn, AntCl 73 (2004) pp. 333-335. - Tiziano Dorandi, REG 116 (2003) pp. 361-363. - Orlando Poltera, MusHelv 61 (2004) pp. 227-228. - Mauro Bonazzi, RSF 59 (2004) pp. 769-775. - Tania Gergel, CR N.S., 55 (2005) pp. 411-413. - G. Veneciano, Ordia prima 3 (2004) pp. 204-207. - J.M. Dillon, AncPhil 25 (2005) pp. 440-443. - Richard Dufour, Phoenix 58 (2004) pp. 563-565. - B. Levett, Mouseion 4 (2004) No. 2, pp. 198-202. - D.C. Hoffman, Rhetoric Society Quarterly 36 (2006) pp. 339-342 [concerne aussi: Michael GAGARIN, Antiphon the Athenian. Oratory, Law, and Justice in the Age of the Sophists (Austin, 2002)]. - R.M. Rosado Fernandes, Euphrosyne 36 (2008) p. 388.
